title: Where Are the Dinos?
description: “I wonder why, I wonder how …Where are all the dinos now?”Boys and girls will delight in this fast-paced rhyming adventure chock-full of hilarious questions from a very persistent young visitor at the zoo.“What do dinos find in shops?Polka-dot tricera-tops?”The laughs keep coming in this charming adventure full of dino-mite humor and fun. It's the perfect good time read that kids will enjoy reading over and over again.
author: Julia Dweck
